attributes.action: relook at the current petrol and diesel at nearly £1.00 per litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fuel Prices for both Petrol and Diesel has reached in some fillings stations over £1 per litre with Oil Company's like Shell and BP making huge profits of over £10 Billion each surly these companies should  more responsible towards there customers and the Government should set a Maximum Fuel price or our transport industry will grind to a halt and normal families will suffer and in some cases will not be able to afford to go to work
